Târgoviște.title: Târgoviște
Târgoviște.byline: Târgovişte is a city in Muntenia, the capital of the medieval principality Wallachia between 1396 and 1714.

Târgu Jiu.title: Târgu Jiu
Târgu Jiu.byline: Târgu Jiu is a city in Oltenia, Romania.

Târnăveni.title: Târnăveni
Târnăveni.byline: Târnăveni, is a city in Mureş County, Transylvania in Romania.
